lyrics:
5 contributorskingston lyricsintro
kingston kingston kingston

chorus

two three nine zero

from then ive been strictly on a mission

all the haters i can spot them from far im sure
jamaicans on slash date
probably representin and bringing it home
after i sing my songs i duck trouble but it keep on lurkin
things going to well the devil start workin

you might also likeverse 2

im watching my peers
bout time in a million
its close man i swear
i feel it in the air and im order for them

the one and only

they praying for my demise

or i be on the floor yo
but no yo
im pull through this game of tug o war

maybe cause im grubbing more
nonetheless im paying my dues
dont hate me

i got next
better yet i got now
everybody got faith and yelling cause my hot style
86 the bullshit they dont want me hostile
ima reign supreme until the day i drop down
